response.overview: Bad Sister Min-woo and Su-mi became siblings through their parents’ remarriage. Su-mi is still secretly in love with her older brother Min-woo, while Min-woo can’t set a wedding date with his live-in girlfriend because of his sister.  Daytime Dream On a hot day, Gye-hyung pulls over his car to take a nap and ends up dreaming about swapping partners with his girlfriend’s junior couple.  Secret Sex Thanks to his wife’s financial stability, Sang-hoon gets to manage a building. Behind his wife’s back, he has an affair with her older sister.  A Friend’s Favor So-yeon asks her friend Jung-hee for a favor so she can meet again with a man she had a blind date with.
response.title: 여동생의 맛
